original_title: Sam Tallent: Waiting for Death to Claim Us
overview: Follows America's dogged stand-up scion Sam Tallent through 13 different venues across the US from sold-out theaters to house parties and rib-joints, all the while COVID barrels down on the nation in early 2020. This is the last comedy special filmed before the country went into lockdown.
title: Sam Tallent: Waiting for Death to Claim Us
